properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 6:58PM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Low Water Advisory, abnormally low water
levels. For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 10 to 20 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and choppy waters.

* WHERE...Pamlico and Pungo Rivers.

* WHEN...For the Low Water Advisory, until 4 AM EST Saturday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Below
normal water levels will result in hazardous navigating
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
